WE ARE CHANGING THE GAME!

Dubai Esports And Games Festival

Founded in 2022, the Dubai Esports & Games Festival celebrates all things gaming. By combining the best in competitive video games with electrifying experiences and next-gen talent

The annual festival aims to become a regular fixture in the international circuit. It's time to play to infinity and beyond!

  • Game Expo Summit

THE GAMEEXPO SUMMIT POWERED BY PG CONNECTS

In collaboration with the esteemed PG Connects team, the upcoming Dubai GameExpo Summit is set to unfold over two days at the Dubai Esports and Game Festival 2024. Anticipating the participation of 1,800+ visitors and 20 indie developers, the event aims to foster discussions among gaming leaders.

With the innovative 'MeetToMatch' system facilitating over 2,000 meetings, the B2B event will provide a platform to explore emerging trends in AI, Web3, the Metaverse, development techniques, monetization, and the burgeoning MENA market. Stay tuned for groundbreaking insights and dynamic networking opportunities.

Learn more
